name: Knockout Artist

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Sneak attack class feature, Improved Unarmed Strike.

sections.body: When you use your unarmed strike to deal nonlethal damage and sneak attack damage to an opponent denied his Dexterity bonus to AC, you gain a +1 bonus on the damage roll per each sneak attack damage die you roll.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You can throw devastating knockout punches.
